net.proteusframework.core.locale.annotation

Annotation Type I18N


  • @Target(value={})
@Documented
@Retention(value=SOURCE)
public @interface I18N
    Represents an internalization record for text localizations.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      L10N[] l10n
      The localizations.
      String symbol
      The symbol for your i18n record.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean delete
      If you ever need to discard localizations that have been in use, you set this to true.

    • Element Detail

      • l10n

        public abstract L10N[] l10n
        The localizations.
        Returns:
        one or more localizations.

      • symbol

        public abstract String symbol
        The symbol for your i18n record. This will be appended to the I18NFile.symbolPrefix().

        Do NOT change the symbol once in use without providing a data conversion. As a workaround, you can mark this as delete()ed and add another I18N.

        Returns:
        the symbol. Non-empty string.

      • delete

        public abstract boolean delete
        If you ever need to discard localizations that have been in use, you set this to true. The tools will eventually delete the corresponding localization records.
        Returns:
        true or false. Defaults to false.
        Default:
        false
